protein.specific_function: Binds specifically to GTP-Rho. May function in a Rho pathway to limit stress fiber formation and/or increase the turnover of F-actin structures in the absence of high levels of RhoA activity

reference.reference_text: Mircescu H, Steuve S, Savonet V, Degraef C, Mellor H, Dumont JE, Maenhaut C, Pirson I: Identification and characterization of a novel activated RhoB binding protein containing a PDZ domain whose expression is specifically modulated in thyroid cells by cAMP. Eur J Biochem. 2002 Dec;269(24):6241-9.
